head.title: Microsoft Support

meta.name: description
meta.content: Microsoft is here to help you with products including Office, Windows, Surface, and more. Find articles, videos, training, tutorials, and more.

head.script: var OOGlobal = { AutoSuggestEndPoint: "//support.office.com/api/autosuggest", AutoSuggestExperimentTags: "P-E-64139-C1-15,P-E-63432-2-9,P-E-63744-2-5,P-E-63674-C1-5,P-E-63502-4-8,P-E-62908-C1-5,P-D-63841-1-1", BaseDomain: location.protocol + "//" + location.host, Culture: "en-US", Language: "en", LCID: "1033", IsAuthenticated: "False", AuthParam: "0", WebAppUrl: "https://office.com/start", Platform: navigator.platform, IsCookieConsentRequired: false, HostOrigin: "" };

p.a: Sign in to your Microsoft account

Tips for remote learning and teaching

img.alt: Your browser does not support video.

div.p: A collection of powerful productivity apps you can use anywhere. Organize your life, expand your creativity, and protect what’s important.

p.a: Learn more about Microsoft 365 apps & features

img.alt: A woman and a man, working together

div.p: Get productive quickly with these Microsoft 365 videos, tutorials, and resources.

img.alt: A girl, working on a laptop

div.p: Access the tools you need for classroom management and student engagement whether you're in the classroom or connecting remotely.
Explore the latest tips to get the most from your Microsoft products.

p.a: GET TIPS FOR WINDOWS, SURFACE, & MORE

img.alt: A woman, working on a laptop with a girl, drawing or writing at a table

div.p: Collaborate with others seamlessly and get more done with Microsoft Teams and Microsoft 365.
As a Microsoft 365 subscriber, you always get the latest features. Discover what’s new and improved today.

img.alt: A man, working on a Windows 10 laptop

div.p: Windows updates will help you manage your time, increase security, and get more creative with Windows 10.

img.alt: An older man, wearing headphones, using a computer

div.p: Learn more about accessibility features and personalize your PC settings.

img.alt: A family of four, seated on a couch together

div.p: Connect with your children, family, or friends with a collection of free activities that everyone can enjoy.
